etymology.description: Semantic: 目(目) (mù, "eye") + Phonetic: 取(取) (qǔ, "take") = related to vision or seeing -> final sound and meaning
etymology.interpretation: 瞿(瞿) (qú) combines 目(目) (mù, "eye") for the semantic element related to vision, with 取(取) (qǔ) to hint at the pronunciation. Despite its eye-related component, the specific applications may vary.

examples.chinese: 瞿是一个不常见的姓(瞿是一個不常見的姓)。
examples.pinyin: Qú shì yī gè bù chángjiàn de xìng。

examples.chinese: 很多古籍论及家族姓氏(很多古籍論及家族姓氏)，其中'瞿'因其发音独特而受到关注(其中『瞿』因其發音獨特而受到關注)。
examples.pinyin: Hěn duō gǔjí lùn jí jiāzú xìngshì，qízhōng 'qú' yīn qí fāyīn dútè ér shòudào guānzhù。
examples.english: Many ancient texts discuss family surnames, among which 'Qú' has attracted attention for its unique pronunciation.
